nodes.text: The Vanguard advanced training program was a training program in the Republic Special Forces Division of the Republic Military. Troopers who underwent the Vanguard program specialized in short-range weapons, such as blaster rifles, and defensive technology.

The vanguard is an advanced class for the trooper class in the Star Wars: The Old Republic MMO video game. This advanced class specializes in blaster rifles, defensive shielding, and absorbing damage in combat. The Imperial counterpart for this archetype is the powertech.
